title: Wall Street Breakfast November 1: Windfall Tax: Good Idea?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Bumper profits: Is a windfall tax on energy producers a good idea? Antitrust push: Penguin Random House (PARA) blocked from buying Simon & Schuster. Nasdaq, S&P, Dow futures rise, yields fall in pre-Fed positioning. Learn how to invest successfully with Alpha Picks here.
